index.title: Home
index.recent_activity_placeholder: As you complete your first entries on Well, they will appear here.

feature_slides.cda_example_thought:
I'm judging myself too harshly...
Everybody makes mistakes!

onboarding.privacy_text_2: our data is stored solely on your device
onboarding.loading_success_text: Okay! - we are all set up!
onboarding.goodbye_text: We hope you enjoy your experience with WorryFree.

accomplish_questionnaire.question: What are you hoping to accomplish using WorryFree?
accomplish_questionnaire.instruction: Choose one or many out of the options below.

options.mood: I want to improve my mood
options.anxiety: I want to reduce my anxiety
options.thinking_habits: I want to build healthy thinking habits
options.challenging_thoughts: I want to learn to challange my negative thoughts
options.mood_journal: I want to start a mood journal
options.emotional_awareness: I want to gain emotional awareness
options.self_esteem: I want to improve my self-esteem
options.sleep: I want to improve my sleep
options.cbt_exercises: I want to practice CBT exercises
options.therapy_support: I want to supplement my talk therapy
options.phobias_fears: I want to learn how to handle my phobias and/or fears

welcome_text.how_may_we_help: How may we help you today?
